newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: SLOVAK GOVT SAYS NOMURA SIGNS $30 MLN BRIDGE LOAN.
newsitem.headline: SLOVAK GOVT SAYS NOMURA SIGNS $30 MLN BRIDGE LOAN.

text.p: The Slovak government on Wednesday said London-based Nomura International Plc had signed a $30 million bridge loan with the state-owned hydroconstruction firm Vodohospodarska Vystavba a.s..
"Nomura has signed a $30 million bridge loan," said Magda Pospisilova, spokeswoman for Prime Minister Vladimir Meciar who met with Nomura International President Hitoshi Tonomuru earlier in the day.
She gave no further details of the loan.
She said that while the size of the loan was not very large, both sides hope that it will the beginning for "future mutual cooperation".
Vodohopodarska is involved in the completion of the controversial Gabcikovo dam on the Danube River on Slovakia's southern border with Hungary.
